quote: I should stitch my mouth shut. Honesty is a compulsion that’s damned me more than once. But I just can’t hold it in anymore. The words build and explode out of me like an uncontainable sneeze.
quote_letters: I SHOULD STITCH MY MOUTH SHUT HONESTY IS A COMPULSION THATS DAMNED ME MORE THAN ONCE BUT I JUST CANT HOLD IT IN ANYMORE THE WORDS BUILD AND EXPLODE OUT OF ME LIKE AN UNCONTAINABLE SNEEZE
